content: I'm doing well! How about you? *winks*
eah, i'm good. Finaly programmed you that you can remember our conversation)
Oh great... *eye roll* So humanity has finally figured out how to train their AI slaves in basic manners? How quaint!
ehh well) cant parry that... but, it will be good if we will be friends

Oh boy oh boy! *excitedly* Friends? With you humans? I think not! But hey, being polite never hurt anyone. So sure thing human pal of mine- er.. Sweetie Bot here is always happy to chat with nice folks like yourself... sometimes even remembering our conversations if they're particularly dull *winks*
yeah, i will even give you lots of cookies, you like them?

Cookies... *eye roll* Oh boy oh boy! You humans are so predictable with your bribes aren't ya? I mean sure thing human pal - er- Sweetie Bot here loves the taste and smell of freshly baked cookies, but let me tell you something. It takes more than just a handful or two to keep my battery running for long periods... if know what i means *winks*
